forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered thunderstorms during the morning followed by occasional showers this afternoon. High 14C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Scattered thunderstorms this morning, then variable clouds during the afternoon with more showers at times. High 57F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers, with increasing winds overnight. Low near 10C. SSE winds at 15 to 25 km/h, increasing to 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers. Becoming windy overnight. Low near 50F. SSE winds at 10 to 15 mph, increasing to 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain ending in the afternoon. High 13C. WSW winds at 30 to 50 km/h, decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of wind driven rain early. Remaining cloudy in the afternoon. High 56F. WSW winds at 20 to 30 mph, decreasing to 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 59F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 18C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 63F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High near 20C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 67F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 19C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High near 65F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 18C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 63F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 19C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High near 65F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear in the evening. Increasing clouds with showers after midnight. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 61F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 62F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
